name: Sprite-generator
tagline: A Python based sprite generator compiles a directory of icon assets into a tightly packed PNG file as well as a CSS file.
body:
Sprite Generator ================ A Python based sprite generator compiles a directory of icon assets into a tightly packed PNG file as well as a CSS file. Installation ------------ We recommend installing the sprite generator via PIP. On OsX and Linux you can do this via the terminal with the following command: 
sudo pip install git+https://github.com/dennisschaaf/sprite-generator.git
Configuration ------------- In the root of your project directory (or any other place) create .sprite_generator file. 
[path]
inputPath=util/assets
outputPath=css/sprite
Usage ----- ``` $ cd /your/project $ sprite_generator.py ``` ### Authors and Contributors > @DennisSchaaf > @frog-eXPeriMeNTaL <- With special thanks to. ### Contact Questions contact: dennis.schaaf@frogdesign.com
